item.title: 罗马尼亚一家法院驳回了网络红人安德鲁-泰特（Andrew Tate）要求归还在案件调查期间被扣押资产的请求，他在该案中被控贩卖人口、强奸和组成犯罪团伙对妇女进行性剥削。
item.description:
A Romanian court denied a request by online influencer Andrew Tate to return assets that were seized during investigations into the case in which he is charged with human trafficking, rape and forming a criminal gang to sexually exploit women. https://t.co/zpIaX62C21

— ABC News (@ABC) March 22, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：据俄罗斯外交部称，莫斯科克洛库斯市政厅发生枪击和爆炸事件，造成至少 40 人死亡，100 多人受伤。
item.description:
BREAKING: At least 40 people were killed and over 100 others were injured in a shooting and explosion at Moscow's Crocus City Hall, according to the Russian Foreign Security Service. https://t.co/mvXvbb9e1t pic.twitter.com/5lOHh7JfWL

— ABC News (@ABC) March 22, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：据俄罗斯外交部称，莫斯科发生枪击和爆炸事件，造成至少 40 人死亡，100 多人受伤。
item.description:
BREAKING: At least 40 people were killed and over 100 others were injured in a shooting and explosion in Moscow, according to the Russian Foreign Security Service.

Russia's foreign ministry called the shooting and explosion a "terrorist attack." https://t.co/wRmTXvxynP

— ABC News (@ABC) March 22, 2024

item.title: 共和党众议员迈克-加拉格尔（Mike Gallagher）已宣布不再寻求连任，他宣布将于下月辞去国会职务，这将使共和党在众议院本已稀薄的多数席位进一步缩水。
item.description:
Republican Rep. Mike Gallagher, who had already announced he would not be seeking reelection, announced that he’s resigning from Congress next month — shrinking the Republicans' already razor-thin majority in the House. https://t.co/rqsDAnSXfA

— ABC News (@ABC) March 22, 2024

item.title: 拜登总统夸口说，美国的暴力犯罪已降至50年来的最低水平之一，但对一些美国人来说，对犯罪的看法却与统计数据相悖。
item.description:
Pres. Biden boasted that violent crime in the U.S. had plummeted to one of the lowest levels in 50 years — but for some Americans, the perception of crime is clashing with the statistics. https://t.co/OVsBC0uUwN

— ABC News (@ABC) March 22, 2024

item.title: "白宫新闻秘书卡琳-让-皮埃尔（Karine Jean-Pierre）周五在威尔士王妃凯特被诊断出患有癌症后说："在这个令人难以置信的艰难时刻，我们与剑桥公爵夫人及其家人和朋友同在。
item.description:
“Our thoughts are with the Duchess of Cambridge and her family members and friends during this incredibly difficult time,” White House press secretary Karine Jean-Pierre said on Friday after Kate, the Princess of Wales, said she was diagnosed with cancer. https://t.co/ePbpzhr4wU pic.twitter.com/fFxCThbt1B

— ABC News (@ABC) March 22, 2024

item.title: 在人们对威尔士王妃凯特的健康和福祉进行了数周的猜测之后，凯特宣布她被诊断出患有癌症：
item.description:
Kate, the Princess of Wales, announced she was diagnosed with cancer after weeks of speculation about her health and well-being.

Here is a look at the timeline of events, dating back to Kate's last official public appearance: https://t.co/4HDnX54Vpb

item.title: 威尔士王妃凯特-米德尔顿（Kate Middleton）说，医生在她接受腹部手术后发现她患有癌症，目前她正在接受预防性化疗。

— ABC News (@ABC) March 22, 2024

item.description:

item.description:
Drake Bell's TV family members are rallying around the actor on social media after he revealed in the docuseries "Quiet on Set: The Dark Side of Kids TV" that he had been sexually abused by former dialogue coach Brian Peck. https://t.co/cvaR9IIKJ0

item.title: 佐治亚州共和党众议员马乔里-泰勒-格林（Marjorie Taylor Greene）已提出辞去议长职务的动议，威胁要在迈克-约翰逊（Mike Johnson）升任议长仅数月后将其赶下台。

item.title: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的 Truth Social 公司已经完成了一项并购，这可能会给他带来超过 30 亿美元的收益，但交易中的一项条款使他无法立即出售自己的股份。
